name: Rations, day
description: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

name: Beer, tankard
description: A simple beverage made from grain.

name: Mead, tankard
description: A simple beverage made from honey.

name: Wine, glass (common)
description: A common beverage made from fermented juice.

name: Wine, glass (fine)
description: A fine beverage made from fermented juice.

name: Liquor, glass
description: An excellent beverage, usually distilled, such as brandy, tequila, rum, or whiskey.
